sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>We don't need availability summarizer scheduled job from "Availability" since its calculated as part of performance calculation</description> <name>Deactivate availability scheduled job</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var availTrigger = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); availTrigger.get('745b9b7743dd2110a6dfaff3fab8f226'); availTrigger.setValue('active', false); availTrigger.update();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-21 16:54:54</sys_created_on> <sys_id>432e8a1443312110a6dfaff3fab8f2e1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Deactivate availability scheduled job</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_432e8a1443312110a6dfaff3fab8f2e1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-21 17:26:52</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
